reviewText: I keep buying this and it keeps getting stolen. I'm def hiding this one. Hope they make a new one someday.
If you can find one. Buy it. If you have one. Record it so you never loose it. A true classic.

This is one truly awesome Street Racing and Track DVD! You name the car its mostlikely on this DVD.  My racing appitite was full when I was done watching it.  This DVD was very well EXPERTLY DONE! A must for all Street Racers.  I cant believe more people haven't taken the time to praise this DVD.  THIS IS ONE YOU WANT TO BUY NOT JUST RENT.
